<p>&lt;p&gt;&amp;lt;!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC “-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN”&lt;/p&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;pre&gt;&amp;quot;http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">>

<p>&lt;p&gt;&amp;lt;html xmlns=“&lt;a href=“<a href=“www.w3.org/1999/xhtmlwww.w3.org/1999/xhtml”>www.w3.org/1999/xhtml>”>www.w3.org/1999/xhtml“>www.w3.org/1999/xhtmlwww.w3.org/1999/xhtml”>www.w3.org/1999/xhtml>;” xml:lang=“en” lang=“en”&amp;gt; &amp;lt;head&amp;gt;&lt;/p&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;pre&gt;&amp;lt;title&amp;gt;modal.js&amp;lt;/title&amp;gt; &amp;lt;meta http-equiv=&amp;quot;Content-Type&amp;quot; content=&amp;quot;text/html; charset=UTF-8&amp;quot; /&amp;gt; &amp;lt;link rel=&amp;quot;stylesheet&amp;quot; href=&amp;quot;../../../../../css/reset.css&amp;quot; type=&amp;quot;text/css&amp;quot; media=&amp;quot;screen&amp;quot; /&amp;gt;&lt;/pre&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;p&gt;&amp;lt;link rel=“stylesheet” href=“../../../../../css/main.css” type=“text/css” media=“screen” /&amp;gt; &amp;lt;link rel=“stylesheet” href=“../../../../../css/github.css” type=“text/css” media=“screen” /&amp;gt; &amp;lt;script src=“../../../../../js/jquery-1.3.2.min.js” type=“text/javascript” charset=“utf-8”&amp;gt;&amp;lt;/script&amp;gt; &amp;lt;script src=“../../../../../js/jquery-effect.js” type=“text/javascript” charset=“utf-8”&amp;gt;&amp;lt;/script&amp;gt; &amp;lt;script src=“../../../../../js/main.js” type=“text/javascript” charset=“utf-8”&amp;gt;&amp;lt;/script&amp;gt; &amp;lt;script src=“../../../../../js/highlight.pack.js” type=“text/javascript” charset=“utf-8”&amp;gt;&amp;lt;/script&amp;gt;&lt;/p&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;pre&gt;&lt;code&gt;&amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;banner&amp;quot;&amp;gt;</p>

<pre><code>&amp;lt;h1&amp;gt;

modal.js

&amp;lt;/h1&amp;gt; &amp;lt;ul class=&amp;quot;files&amp;quot;&amp;gt;

&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;app/assets/javascripts/vendor/modal.js&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;
&amp;lt;li&amp;gt;Last modified: 2014-06-10 17:47:08 +0200&amp;lt;/li&amp;gt;

&amp;lt;/ul&amp;gt;</code></pre>

<p>&amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;</p>

<p>&amp;lt;div id=&amp;quot;bodyContent&amp;quot;&amp;gt;</p>

<pre>&amp;lt;div id=&amp;quot;content&amp;quot;&amp;gt;</pre>

<p>&amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;description&amp;quot;&amp;gt;&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;p&gt;&amp;lt;pre&amp;gt;A simple jQuery modal (http://github.com/kylefox/jquery-modal) Version 0.5.5&amp;lt;/pre&amp;gt;&lt;/p&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;p&gt;&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;(function($) {&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;&lt;/p&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;p&gt;&amp;lt;pre&amp;gt;&amp;lt;code&amp;gt;var current = null;&lt;/p&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;p&gt;$.modal = function(el, options) {&lt;/p&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;pre&gt;&lt;code&gt;$.modal.close(); // Close any open modals. var remove, target; this.$body = $(&amp;amp;#39;body&amp;amp;#39;); this.options = $.extend({}, $.modal.defaults, options); this.options.doFade

!isNaN(parseInt(this.options.fadeDuration, 10)); if

(el.is(&amp;amp;#39;a&amp;amp;#39;)) {</p>

<pre><code>target = el.attr(&amp;amp;#39;href&amp;amp;#39;); //Select element by id from href if (/^#/.test(target)) {

this.$elm = $(target);
if (this.$elm.length !== 1) return null;
this.open();

//AJAX } else {

this.$elm = $(&amp;amp;#39;&amp;amp;lt;div&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;#39;);
this.$body.append(this.$elm);
remove = function(event, modal) { modal.elm.remove(); };
this.showSpinner();
el.trigger($.modal.AJAX_SEND);
$.get(target).done(function(html) {
  if (!current) return;
  el.trigger($.modal.AJAX_SUCCESS);
  current.$elm.empty().append(html).on($.modal.CLOSE, remove);
  current.hideSpinner();
  current.open();
  el.trigger($.modal.AJAX_COMPLETE);
}).fail(function() {
  el.trigger($.modal.AJAX_FAIL);
  current.hideSpinner();
  el.trigger($.modal.AJAX_COMPLETE);
});

}</code></pre>

<p>} else {</p>

<pre>this.$elm = el; this.open();</pre>

<p>}&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;p&gt;};&lt;/p&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;p&gt;$.modal.prototype = {&lt;/p&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;pre&gt;&lt;code&gt;constructor: $.modal,</p>

<p>open: function() {</p>

<pre><code>var m = this; if(this.options.doFade) {

this.block();
setTimeout(function() {
  m.show();
}, this.options.fadeDuration * this.options.fadeDelay);

} else {

this.block();
this.show();

} if (this.options.escapeClose) {

$(document).on(&amp;amp;#39;keydown.modal&amp;amp;#39;, function(event) {
  if (event.which == 27) $.modal.close();
});

} if (this.options.clickClose) this.blocker.click($.modal.close);</code></pre>

<p>},</p>

<p>close: function() {</p>

<pre>this.unblock(); this.hide(); $(document).off(&amp;amp;#39;keydown.modal&amp;amp;#39;);</pre>

<p>},</p>

<p>block: function() {</p>

<pre><code>var initialOpacity = this.options.doFade ? 0 : this.options.opacity; this.$elm.trigger($.modal.BEFORE_BLOCK, [this._ctx()]); this.blocker = $(&amp;amp;#39;&amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;quot;jquery-modal blocker&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;#39;).css({

top: 0, right: 0, bottom: 0, left: 0,
width: &amp;amp;quot;100%&amp;amp;quot;, height: &amp;amp;quot;100%&amp;amp;quot;,
position: &amp;amp;quot;fixed&amp;amp;quot;,
zIndex: this.options.zIndex,
background: this.options.overlay,
opacity: initialOpacity

}); this.$body.append(this.blocker); if(this.options.doFade) {

this.blocker.animate({opacity: this.options.opacity}, this.options.fadeDuration);

} this.$elm.trigger($.modal.BLOCK, [this._ctx()]);</code></pre>

<p>},</p>

<p>unblock: function() {</p>

<pre><code>if(this.options.doFade) {

this.blocker.fadeOut(this.options.fadeDuration, function() {
  $(this).remove();
});

} else {

this.blocker.remove();

}</code></pre>

<p>},</p>

<p>show: function() {</p>

<pre><code>this.$elm.trigger($.modal.BEFORE_OPEN, [this._ctx()]); if (this.options.showClose) {

this.closeButton = $(&amp;amp;#39;&amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;quot;#close-modal&amp;amp;quot; rel=&amp;amp;quot;modal:close&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;close-modal &amp;amp;#39; + this.options.closeClass + &amp;amp;#39;&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;#39; + this.options.closeText + &amp;amp;#39;&amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;#39;);
this.$elm.append(this.closeButton);

} this.$elm.addClass(this.options.modalClass + &amp;amp;#39; current&amp;amp;#39;); this.center(); if(this.options.doFade) {

this.$elm.fadeIn(this.options.fadeDuration);

} else {

this.$elm.show();

} this.$elm.trigger($.modal.OPEN, [this._ctx()]);</code></pre>

<p>},</p>

<p>hide: function() {</p>

<pre><code>this.$elm.trigger($.modal.BEFORE_CLOSE, [this._ctx()]); if (this.closeButton) this.closeButton.remove(); this.$elm.removeClass(&amp;amp;#39;current&amp;amp;#39;);

if(this.options.doFade) {

this.$elm.fadeOut(this.options.fadeDuration);

} else {

this.$elm.hide();

} this.$elm.trigger($.modal.CLOSE, [this._ctx()]);</code></pre>

<p>},</p>

<p>showSpinner: function() {</p>

<pre><code>if (!this.options.showSpinner) return; this.spinner = this.spinner || $(&amp;amp;#39;&amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;#39; + this.options.modalClass + &amp;amp;#39;-spinner&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;#39;)

.append(this.options.spinnerHtml);

this.$body.append(this.spinner); this.spinner.show();</code></pre>

<p>},</p>

<p>hideSpinner: function() {</p>

<pre>if (this.spinner) this.spinner.remove();</pre>

<p>},</p>

<p>center: function() {</p>

<pre><code>this.$elm.css({

position: &amp;amp;#39;fixed&amp;amp;#39;,
top: &amp;amp;quot;50%&amp;amp;quot;,
left: &amp;amp;quot;50%&amp;amp;quot;,
marginTop: - (this.$elm.outerHeight() / 2),
marginLeft: - (this.$elm.outerWidth() / 2),
zIndex: this.options.zIndex + 1

});</code></pre>

<p>},</p>

<p>//Return context for custom events _ctx: function() {</p>

<pre>return { elm: this.$elm, blocker: this.blocker, options: this.options };</pre>

<p>}&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;p&gt;};&lt;/p&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;p&gt;//resize is alias for center for now $.modal.prototype.resize = $.modal.prototype.center;&lt;/p&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;p&gt;$.modal.close = function(event) {&lt;/p&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;pre&gt;if (!current) return; if (event) event.preventDefault(); current.close(); var that = current.$elm; current = null; return that;&lt;/pre&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;p&gt;};&lt;/p&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;p&gt;$.modal.resize = function() {&lt;/p&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;pre&gt;if (!current) return; current.resize();&lt;/pre&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;p&gt;};&lt;/p&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;p&gt;// Returns if there currently is an active modal $.modal.isActive

function () {&lt;/p&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;pre&gt;return current ? true : false;&lt;/pre&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;p&gt;};&lt;/p&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;p&gt;$.modal.defaults = {&lt;/p&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;pre&gt;overlay: &amp;amp;quot;#000&amp;amp;quot;, opacity: 0.6, zIndex: 1, escapeClose: true, clickClose: true, closeText: &amp;amp;#39;Close&amp;amp;#39;, closeClass: &amp;amp;#39;&amp;amp;#39;, modalClass: &amp;amp;quot;modal&amp;amp;quot;, spinnerHtml: null, showSpinner: true, showClose: true, fadeDuration: 300, // Number of milliseconds the fade animation takes. fadeDelay: 0.25 // Point during the overlay&amp;amp;#39;s fade-in that the modal begins to fade in (.5 = 50%, 1.5 = 150%, etc.)&lt;/pre&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;p&gt;};&lt;/p&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;p&gt;// Event constants $.modal.BEFORE_BLOCK = &amp;amp;#39;modal:before-block&amp;amp;#39;; $.modal.BLOCK = &amp;amp;#39;modal:block&amp;amp;#39;; $.modal.BEFORE_OPEN = &amp;amp;#39;modal:before-open&amp;amp;#39;; $.modal.OPEN = &amp;amp;#39;modal:open&amp;amp;#39;; $.modal.BEFORE_CLOSE = &amp;amp;#39;modal:before-close&amp;amp;#39;; $.modal.CLOSE = &amp;amp;#39;modal:close&amp;amp;#39;; $.modal.AJAX_SEND = &amp;amp;#39;modal:ajax:send&amp;amp;#39;; $.modal.AJAX_SUCCESS = &amp;amp;#39;modal:ajax:success&amp;amp;#39;; $.modal.AJAX_FAIL = &amp;amp;#39;modal:ajax:fail&amp;amp;#39;; $.modal.AJAX_COMPLETE = &amp;amp;#39;modal:ajax:complete&amp;amp;#39;;&lt;/p&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;p&gt;$.fn.modal = function(options){&lt;/p&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;pre&gt;&lt;code&gt;if (this.length === 1) {</p>

<pre>current = new $.modal(this, options);</pre>

<p>} return this;&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;p&gt;};&lt;/p&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;p&gt;// Automatically bind links with rel=&amp;amp;quot;modal:close&amp;amp;quot; to, well, close the modal. $(document).on(&amp;amp;#39;click.modal&amp;amp;#39;, &amp;amp;#&lt;a href=“rel=&amp;quot;modal:close&amp;quot;”&gt;39;a&lt;/a&gt;&amp;amp;#39;, $.modal.close); $(document).on(&amp;amp;#39;click.modal&amp;amp;#39;, &amp;amp;#&lt;a href=“rel=&amp;quot;modal:open&amp;quot;”&gt;39;a&lt;/a&gt;&amp;amp;#39;, function(event) {&lt;/p&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;pre&gt;event.preventDefault(); $(this).modal();&lt;/pre&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;p&gt;});&amp;lt;/code&amp;gt;&amp;lt;/pre&amp;gt;&lt;/p&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;p&gt;&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;})(jQuery);&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;&lt;/p&gt;</p>

<p>&lt;pre&gt;&lt;code&gt; &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;</p>
